body: Just finished building my first ever #PC! Check out the build. I’m super proud of it, but let me know if you see any ways to improve! #gamingPC #tech

comments.body: That looks so clean! What kind of graphics card did you use?
@78787 Thanks! I went with the NVIDIA RTX 3070. It was a bit of a splurge, but I wanted something future-proof for gaming.
Solid build! Did you do any custom cooling, or just stick with air cooling?
@89898 I went with an air cooling setup for now. Maybe I’ll upgrade to liquid cooling down the road, but it’s doing the job for now!
That RGB lighting looks sick! What case are you using? It looks super spacious.
@45454 Appreciate it! It’s the NZXT H510. Plenty of room for cable management, which made the build so much easier!
Nice! What’s the first game you’re going to play on it?
@23232 I’m thinking of starting with *Cyberpunk 2077*—I’ve heard it looks incredible with the graphics maxed out!
Congrats on the build! Are you planning on upgrading any other parts soon?
@34343 Thanks! I might upgrade the RAM in the future, but for now, I’m happy with it. I want to see how it handles everything first!
